sampleDescriptions: Farm bill re-authorization, and ensuring robust continuance (and funding) of certain energy title programs, namely sections 9002, 9003, REAP, BCAP, 9005 and BRDI programs.  Also opening 9003 to full p
Maintaining Renewable Fuels Standard program run by EPA, without changes harmful to advanced biofuels.  Support relevant biomass funding at DOE.
